data.meta_site_name: BHAIRABPUR NETAJI M.E. SCHOOL. ভৈৰৱপুৰ নেতাজী এম. ই. স্কুল
data.text:
HISTORY

Its about thirty years ago, the light of institutional education of Bhairabpur region lacked its essence the then. Momently in the mind of some education-devotee persons filliped the inclination of institutional education. As a result of this inclination Bhairabpur Netaji M.E. School was established on 03-05-1975. With the utmost efforts of Late Ashutosh Upadhyaya the school began to fleeting improvement and now it has diffused the fragrance of education in this habitant.

VISION:

Bhairabpur Netaji M. E. School in assistance of Sarva Siksha Abhijan shall always strive for imparting elementary education especially to the desiring and deserving students who belong to unprivileged and deprived sections of the society and for motivating them for the changing trends of higher education in the global perspective. It also focuses for creating competent, compassionate and philanthropic human resources, helping them a step ahead in front of the society. It shall strive to inculcate tolerance and respect for all cultures fostering among the students the strength of mind to sweep off the discrimination prevailed in the present society in terms of caste, creed, religion and gender, besides promoting patriotism and universal brotherhood among them.

MISSION:

Bhairabpur Netaji M.E. School the one situated in a remote area of Silapathar shall make endeavor to create and maintain a congenial academic ambiance in and around its campus and the society in which located to achieve its long cherished vision. It shall also adhere to its holistic pledge to perform curricular transactions regularly and co-curricular and extra curricular activities from time to time. It shall develop a bond of family membership and team spirit among the members of teaching and non-teaching staff, the students and their parents along with the community pupil. Above all, the school shall constantly strive to create an environment for healthy intellectual and physical growth of the students in consonance with the way to achieving the goal of cherished vision.

AIMS:

The chief aim of the school is to provide useful and relevant elementary education for all children in age group of 6-14.

The school also tries to bridge up social, regional, gender and emotional gaps, with the active participation of the community people in the management of the school.

It alongwith allows children to learn about and master their natural environment in a manner that allows the fullest harnessing of their human potential both spiritually and materially.

OBJECTIVES:
